name: insurance
description: small api to provide insurance quotes

scripts.build:db: npm run build:migrations && npm run build:seeds
scripts.migrate:make: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader tsx' npx knex --knexfile src/api/clients/knex/knexfile.ts migrate:make
scripts.migrate:latest: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader tsx' npx knex --knexfile src/api/clients/knex/knexfile.ts migrate:latest
scripts.seed:run: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader tsx' npx knex --knexfile src/api/clients/knex/knexfile.ts seed:run
scripts.migrate:rollback: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader tsx' npx knex --knexfile src/api/clients/knex/knexfile.ts migrate:rollback

author: Tha√≠s
